Title: Sports Marketing
Short Intro: Today, there is demand for people skilled in Sports Marketing.  Organizations want your expertise to strength and grow customer bases and teams want to enlarge their fan base, attract new sponsors to their sport, build strong programs with existing sponsors, and run their fan conventions and other events.
